name: RoyalButts
description:
The opportunity we all have been waiting for! Sneak in their den and just kill all 225 of them. Royal Butts is a 2D side scrolling shoot-em-up game featuring a global leaderboard, 11 levels with 3 boss fights plus a secret ending.

Dedicated  to all fellow Sri Lankans who've lost they're dreams cause of corrupt politicians. Disclaimer:

This game contains stupid adult humor and cartoon violence , and was created strictly for comedic/artistic purposes. No offence is intended toward any individuals featured.

Instructions:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space or Mouse button to shoot
  • Make sure you play the game with internet connection if you wanna take part in global leaderboards. You can submit your speed run time once you defeat the final boss.
Streaming/Recording Instructions,
  • Press F11 to toggle Fullscreen, gameplay recording and taking screenshots is only possible in windowed mode.
  • Press F12 to toggle mute.

Made with ❤ in SriLanka with godot.
